title: On-Site Management, Oversized Roman Bathtubs "Ask about our specials"

Flamingo Road #101 Las Vegas, NV 89103', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Website: <URL>', 'Fifty-Seven 95 Flamingo boasts the best of all worlds -- a fine residential location that is across the street from plenty of exciting restaurants, shopping, and where a short drive puts you in the middle of all the action and nightlife of the Las Vegas Strip.', 'The I-15 are easily accessible and just a few street lights down the road.', 'Fifty-Seven 95 Flamingo is newly professionally managed by Cushman & Wakefield.', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES:', '• Recycling', '• On-Site Maintenance', '• Free Weights', '• Courtyard', '• Carport', '• Resort-Style Pool', '• Resort-Style Spa', '• Fitness Center onsite and fully-loaded', '• Planned Events and Activities for Residents', '• Complimentary Daily Refreshments with Coffee Bar', '• Free Wi-Fi Access', '• New Renovations', '• Lush Landscaping', '• Professional On-Site Management Staff', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES:', '• Single-Story Floor Plans', '• Hardwood-Look Flooring', '• Built-In Microwave Oven', '• Gas Range', '• Ceiling fans', '• Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '• In-Home Washer and Dryer', '• Covered Patio/Balcony', '• 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Community Hours:', 'Monday: 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Tuesday: 8:00am', 'to 5:00pm', 'Wednesday: 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Thursday: 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Friday: 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday:', '10:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday:', '10:00am to 5:00pm', 'We look forward to welcoming you!']
